name: The Punk Effect - Dark Style
description: In line with the types of sites I've been modifying in the last few weeks, finally a high contrast theme is here for the Punk Effect, home of the #CUPodcast!

user.name: CheatFreak47
user.about: I make userstyles that usually make sites easier to use or make them easier on the eyes.

additional_info:
-made podbean theme optional, changed theme name, updated screenshot
-made a rudimentary attempt at theming the Podbean player, problem is that to do it so it works on chrome, I had to set it up to theme all podbean players on all websites... so... yeah. Deal with that, I guess. <3
-beautified the somewhat messy code, todo: clean up the code by using multiple selectors for one thing, such as a color change.
-added something I missed, specifically a specifically specified p tag header
-fixed a typo in the description
-initial upload, did most of the website, may have missed a few things, but it should be good for now.

style_setting_options.label: Yes, Please!
